name: Unlimited Restaurant Voucher
description: Upon usage, increase the selected hero's level to 100.

name: Book of Evolution
description: Upon usage, increase the selected hero's Upgrade Stage to 6

name: Oath of Determination
description: Upon usage, increase the selected hero's Trust Level to 10

name: Sandwich
description: Increases experience by 250 when used to enhance a hero.

name: Cake Slice
description: Increases experience by 600 when used to enhance a hero.

name: Prosciutto
description: Increases experience by 2 500 when used to enhance a hero.

name: Steak Dish
description: Increases experience by 8 000 when used to enhance a hero.

name: Food
description: Steak Dish / Prosciutto / Cake Slice / Sandwich.

name: Light Upgrade Stone Fragment
description: A fragment of an Upgrade Stone containing Light energy. Can be used to upgrade heroes. Can be given as a present to a hero of the same element to raise their Trust Level. Increases trust by 5.

name: Light Upgrade Stone Piece
description: A piece of an Upgrade Stone containing Light energy. Can be used to upgrade heroes. Can be given as a present to a hero of the same element to raise their Trust Level. Increases trust by 10.

name: Light Upgrade Stone
description: An Upgrade Stone containing Light energy. Can be used to upgrade heroes. Can be given as a present to a hero of the same element to raise their Trust Level. Increases trust by 25.

name: Refined Light Upgrade Stone
description: A refined Light Upgrade Stone with enhanced purity. Can be used to upgrade heroes. Can be given as a present to a hero of the same element to raise their Trust Level. Increases trust by 50.

name: USB Drive
description: Gift this item to a hero you want to build friendship with to increase their trust level by 100. If this is a present they like, you will gain a bonus increase to their trust level.

name: Portable Gaming Device
description: Gift this item to a hero you want to build friendship with to increase their trust level by 200. If this is a present they like, you will gain a bonus increase to their trust level.

name: Smartphone

name: Basic Skill Manual
description: Contains basic knowledge on skill use. Can be used to enhance skills.

name: Intermediate Skill Manual
description: Contains advanced knowledge on skill use. Can be used to enhance skills.

name: Professional Skill Manual
description: Contains the knowledge of masters who reached the pinnacle of skill use. Can be used to enhance skills.

name: Purple Stardust
description: A rare material used for enhancing Talisman.

name: Blue Stardust
description: A material used for enhancing Talisman.

name: Purple Memory Stone
description: A rare material used for enhancing Exclusive Equipment.

name: Blue Memory Stone
description: A material used for enhancing Exclusive Equipment.

name: Apprentice's Hammer
description: Increases experience by 100 when used to enhance gear.

name: Expert's Hammer
description: Increases experience by 250 when used to enhance gear.

name: Master's Hammer
description: Increases experience by 500 when used to enhance gear.

name: Artisan's Hammer
description: Increases experience by 1000 when used to enhance gear.

name: Glunite
description: A malleable mineral that can be processed to take on specific properties of a piece of gear. It can be used as a substite material for normal-epic gear breakthroughs.

name: Glunite (Event)
description: Glunite that can be used as a material for breakthrough for gear purchased from the event shop.

name: Refined Glunite
description: A mineral that was created by refining Glunite, so that it could match even the rarest types of gear. It can be used as a substite material for legendary gear breakthroughs.

name: Event Glunite
description: Increases experience by 500 when used to enhance gear.Glunite that can be used as a material for breakthrough for gear purchased from event shop.

name: Armor Glunite
description: A mineral that was created by refining Glunite, so that it could match even the rarest types of gear. It can be used as a substite material for legendary armor breakthroughs.

name: Transistone (Total)
description: A stone that reacts to substats on gear? It will change all substats that are currently applied

name: Transistone (Individual)
description: A stone that reacts to substats on gear. It will let you select and change 1 substat that is currently applied.

name: Potentium (Armor)
description: An extremely rare abrasive. You can use this when crafting armor to draw out the power you desire from the gear your craft.

name: Potentium (Weapon/Accessory)
description: An extremely rare abrasive. Using this to craft weapons or accessories will draw out the power you desire from the gear you intrend to craft.

name: Effectium
description: Precious materials used for Precise Crafting. Obtainable through Terminus Isle Exploration.

name: Normal Reforge Catalyst
description: A material extracted from dismantling gear. Can be used to reforge gear of normal quality to unleash its potential.

name: Superior Reforge Catalyst
description: A material extracted from dismantling gear. Can be used to reforge gear of superior quality to unleash its potential.

name: Epic Reforge Catalyst
description: A material extracted from dismantling gear. Can be used to reforge gear of epic quality to unleash its potential.

name: Legendary Reforge Catalyst
description: A material extracted from dismantling gear. Can be used to reforge gear of legendary quality to unleash its potential.

name: Ether
description: A rare resource that can occasionally be found all over Mirsha. Can be used for special purposes.

name: Limited Recruitment Ticket
description: A ticket used for limit recruitement. Each ticket will recruit one hero.

name: Call of the Demiurge (Event)
description: A conduit that draws out the energy of the Demiurge. A sufficient number of these will allow you to recruit the Demiurge. Using this resource does not provide any mileage rewards.

name: Call of the Demiurge
description: A conduit that draws out the energy of the Demiurge. A sufficient number of these will allow you to recruit the Demiurge.

name: Special Recruitment Ticket
description: A ticket used for special recruitement. Each ticket will recruit one hero.

name: Special Recruitment Ticket (Event)
description: A ticket used for special recruitement. Each ticket will recruit one hero. Using this ticket does not provide any mileage rewards.

name: Proof of Destiny
description: A normal resource used for Quirks to enhance heroes.

name: Token of Connection
description: A superior resource used for Quirks to enhance heroes.

name: Proof of Worth
description: A rare material used for Quirks to enhance heroes through the Adventure License category.

name: Demiurge Selection Ticket
description: You can select and recruit one Demiurge Hero. Select 1 of Demiurge Stella, Demiurge Astei, Demiurge Drakhan, Demiurge Vlada, or Monad Eva.

name: “New Beginning” Title
description: Consume 1 less Stamina when playing Adventure / Special Request / Skyward Tower.

name: “New Beginning” Profile Frame
description: Service Transfer Completion Reward [New Beginning] Frame.

name: Gold
description: A type of currency used across Mirsha. Can be used for many transactions.

name: Gold
description: A type of currency used across Mirsha. Can be used for many transactions.

name: Guild Coin
description: A type of currency used across Mirsha. Can be used in guild daily and weekly shop.

name: Joint Challenge Coin
description: Coins issued based on the points achieved in the joint challenge. It can be exchanged for goods at the Joint Challenge Shop.

name: Friend Point
description: A type of currency used across Mirsha. Can be used in Friendship shop.

name: Arena Medal
description: A type of currency used across Mirsha. Can be used in Arena shop.

name: Antimatter
description: Antiparticle material that can be gained in small amounts through the Antiparticle Generator. Used to open and enhance facilities.

name: Archdemon's Trace
description: A type of currency used across Mirsha. Can be used in Archdemon's shop.

name: Star's Memory
description: A crystal containung some of the memories of Mirsha. It can be exchanged for various items.

name: World Boss Token
description: A token obtained by defeating the World Boss.

name: License Point
description: Points that can be obtained by completing Adventure License missions. You can exchange it for a variety of items in the Shop.

name: Survey Contributions
description: Points acquired for contributing information to areas that needed to be surveyed. Survey points can be exchanged for items at the Survey Hub.

name: Automaton Coin
description: This currency can be earned by clearing the Skyward Tower after receiving the first-time clear reward. It can be used to purchase items in the Skyward Tower Shop.

name: [Guild] Upgrade Stone Chest
description: An upgrade stone box purchased with guild contributions. Obtain one random upgrade stone of any quality.

name: Epic Quality Present Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain 3 epic quality presents.

name: Superior Quality Present Chest
description: Obtain 3 of each superior quality presents.

name: [Guild] Enhancement Toolbox
description: An enhancement toolbox purchased with guild contributions. Obtain one random enhancement hammer of any quality.

name: [Guild] Epic-Legendary Accessory Chest
description: An equipment chest purchased with guild contributions. Obtain one 4-6★ accessory of epic to legendary quality

name: Stage 3 Gem Chest
description: Obtain each Stage 3 Gem x1.

name: Gems
description: Various gems.

name: Hero Pieces
description: Transcend a hero by collecting 150 of their Hero Pieces.

name: Cosmetic
description: Costume, Frame, Chibi.

name: Stage 5 Random Gem Chest
description: Obtain 1 random Stage 5 Gem.

name: Stage 2 Random Gem Chest
description: Obtain 1 random Stage 2 Gem.

name: [Guild] 3★ Hero Piece Selection Chest
description:
You can select and obtain pieces of your desired heroes.
Obtainable hero piece :
-Dahlia
-Aer
-Ame
-Epsilon
-Drakhan

name: Legendary Quality Present Chest
description:
Select and obtain one of the following:
-Dungeon Core Fragment
-Noble's Ceremonial Sword
-Magic Textbook
-Dreamcatcher
-Leaf of World Tree

name: Stage 3 Gem Chest
description: Obtain one Stage 3 Gem.

name: Stage 4 Gem Chest
description: Obtain one Stage 4 Gem.

name: Stamina
description: The energy needed for activities. Used in various battle content.

name: Upgrade Stone Selection Chest
description:
Select and obtain one of the following:
-Earth Upgrade Stone x5
-Fire Upgrade Stone x5
-Water Upgrade Stone x5
-Light Upgrade Stone x5
-Dark Upgrade Stone x5

name: Upgrade Stone Piece Selection Chest
description:
Select and obtain one of the following:
-Earth Upgrade Stone Piece x5
-Fire Upgrade Stone Piece x5
-Water Upgrade Stone Piece x5
-Light Upgrade Stone Piece x5
-Dark Upgrade Stone Piece x5

name: Upgrade Stone Fragment Selection Chest
description:
Select and obtain one of the following:
-Earth Upgrade Stone Fragment x10
-Fire Upgrade Stone Fragment x10
-Water Upgrade Stone Fragment x10
-Light Upgrade Stone Fragment x10
-Dark Upgrade Stone Fragment x10

name: 3★ Hero Piece Selective Exchange Ticket
description: Obtain 10 pieces of a 3★ hero of your choice.

name: 1-2★ Hero Piece Random Exchange Ticket
description: Obtain 1-2★ Hero Piece x1.

name: Arena Ticket
description: A ticket needed to enter the Arena.

name: Apprentice's Hammer Chest
description: Obtain a random number of Apprentice's Hammers. There is a low chance you will obtain Expert's Hammers.

name: Ether Amulet
description: Mainstat : PEN%

name: Ether Blade
description: Mainstat : HP%

name: Refined Upgrade Stone Selection Chest
description:
Select and obtain one of the following:
-Refined Earth Upgrade Stone x1
-Refined Fire Upgrade Stone x1
-Refined Water Upgrade Stone x1
-Refined Light Upgrade Stone x1
-Refined Dark Upgrade Stone x1

name: Time Rewinder
description: An item that can revert growth status of a hero. Used to reset growth.

name: 6★ Talisman Selection Chest
description: Obtain one out of 11 different 6★ Talismans at random.

name: 5★ Random Talisman Chest
description: Obtain one out of 11 different 5★ Talismans at random.

name: Undefeated Leader Nella
description: This is a costume that can be worn by Gnosis Nella.

name: Indomitable Dragon Drakhan
description: This is a costume that can be worn by Demiurge Drakhan.

name: 5★ Epic Helmet Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 5★ epic Helmet.

name: 5★ Epic Gloves Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 5★ epic Gloves.

name: 5★ Epic Armor Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 5★ epic Armor.

name: 5★ Epic Boots Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 5★ epic Boots.

name: 5★ Epic Weapon
description: Obtain one 5★ epic Weapon.

name: 5★ Epic Accessory
description: Obtain one 5★ epic Accessory.

name: Gear Crafting Material Selection Chest (Normal)
description: Select and obtain normal gear crafting material available from Special Requests.

name: Gear Crafting Material Selection Chest (Superior)
description: Select and obtain superior gear crafting material available from Special Requests.

name: 10% Legendary Abrasive
description: Increases the chance of crafting gear of legendary quality by 10%.

name: 30% Epic Abrasive
description: Increases the chance of crafting gear of epic quality by 30%.

name: Powerful Adventurer's Talisman
description:
Recovers 30 Action Points when using an ultimate.
 Mainstats : Critical hit chance

name: Sharp Adventurer's Talisman
description:
Generates 10 Chain Points when an attack scores a critical hit.
 Mainstats : Attack %

name: Adventurer's Sword
description:
Has 15% chance to increase Penetration for 1 turn after taking an action.
 Mainstats : Health %

name: Adventurer's Necklace
description:
Has 15% chance to increase Penetration for 1 turn after being hit.
 Mainstats : Heals when hit %

name: Stage 5-6 Gem Chest
description: Obtain 1 Stage 5-6 Gem.

name: 6★ Legendary Helmet [Burst]
description: Gains AP at the start of battle +25.

name: 6★ Legendary Gloves [Burst]
description: Gains AP at the start of battle +25.

name: 6★ Legendary Armor [Burst]
description: Gains AP at the start of battle +25.

name: 6★ Legendary Boots [Burst]
description: Gains AP at the start of battle +25.

name: 6★ Equipment
description: Various 6★ items.

name: 5★ Equipment
description: Various 5★ items.

name: 5★ Legendary Weapon Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 5★ legendary Weapon.

name: 5★ Legendary Accessory Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 5★ legendary Accessory.

name: 6★ Legendary Weapon Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 6★ legendary Weapon.

name: 6★ Legendary Accessory Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 6★ legendary Accessory.

name: 6★ Legendary Helmet Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 6★ Legendary Helmet. The equipment provided have fixed stats

name: 6★ Legendary Armor Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 6★ Legendary Armor. The equipment provided have fixed stats

name: 6★ Legendary Gloves Selection Chest
description: Select and obtain one 6★ Legendary Gloves. The equipment provided have fixed stats
